metadata.name: Credentials In Files
metadata.comment: Detecting attempts to extract passwords with grep and laZagne

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/grep')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('password')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lazagne'))))

output.summary: Detecting attempts to extract passwords with grep and laZagne
